verbose_text: The possibility of a positive feedback loop is confirmed by two previous experimental observations (a) phosphorylation of CPEB1 regulates the synthesis of alphaCaMKII molecules through polyadenylation of alphaCaMKII mRNA [XREF_BIBR] (b) alphaCaMKII phosphorylates the CPEB1 molecule [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
